mdRecord.dcterms:title: Topographical map of Eastern Virginia From Fredericksburg to Richmond taken from tracings (now in the possession of the government) of the original railroad surveys of this portion of the state, comprising the topography for six miles on each side of the track

mdRecord.dcterms:source: Original periodical illustration: A topographical map of Eastern Virginia From Fredericksburg to Richmond taken from tracings (now in the possession of the government) of the original railroad surveys of this portion of the state, comprising the topography for six miles on each side of the track, Harper's Weekly, Dec. 27, 1862, p. 821, Richmond, Virginia Maps and Prints Collection, M 190, Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University.
